2. Taurus - 6/10 - Taurus are stubborn and may not listen to advice, leading to errors.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Geminis are quick-witted and adaptable, but their constant need for variety can lead to mistakes.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Cancers are emotional and moody, which can cloud their judgment and cause them to make poor decisions.
5. Leo - 7/10 - Leos are confident and charismatic, but their ego can sometimes get in the way of good decision-making.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Virgos are analytical and detail-oriented, making them more likely to catch mistakes before they happen.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Libras are fair-minded and diplomatic, but their tendency to weigh options forever can lead to indecision.
8. Scorpio - 6/10 - Scorpios are intense and perceptive, but their strong emotions can sometimes cloud their judgment.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Sagittarians are optimistic and adventurous, but their impulsiveness can get them into trouble.
10. Capricorn - 5/10 - Capricorns are practical and disciplined, but their fear of failure can hold them back from taking risks.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Aquarians are humanitarian and forward-thinking, but their tendency to be overly detached can lead to mistakes.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Pisces are dreamy and empathetic, but their lack of focus and tendency to get lost in their own world can cause them to make poor decisions.
